about_the_game: In the future, humanity seeks to resolve Earth’s overpopulation problem by terraforming Mars as their 2md home. 500 years later, the United Nations sends out an expedition team to explore it. But an unintended side effect of the process has unleashed a horror no one could ever have imagined: the planet has become infested with man-sized cockroaches that prey on humans.

#label_about_the_series

In the future, humanity seeks to resolve Earth’s overpopulation problem by terraforming Mars as their 2md home. 500 years later, the United Nations sends out an expedition team to explore it. But an unintended side effect of the process has unleashed a horror no one could ever have imagined: the planet has become infested with man-sized cockroaches that prey on humans.

Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
